r.d: This is the PostGreSQL MDB2 driver.
r.n: - added listTableViews() (request #6773) - explicitly set is_manip parameter to false for transaction debug calls - pass parameter array as debug() all with scope "parameters" in every execute() call (bug #4119) - typo fixes in phpdoc (thx Stoyan) - added support for fixed and variable types for 'text' in declarations, as well as in reverse engineering (Request #1523) - made _doQuery() return a reference - added userinfo's to all raiseError calls that previously had none - calling PREPARE is always a manip query - added 'prepared_statements' supported meta data setting - strip of file:// prefix in writeLOBToFile() - typo fix ressource/resource in LOB array - added missing supported parameter to prepare() signature - properly handle explicit error codes in errorInfo() - moved from OID to TEXT and BYTEA (OID handling was broken, its also deprecated)
